text.quote: 000: Clause 4, page 7, line 22, leave out from beginning to end of line 42 on page 10, and insert—
(1) A ring-fenced body may not be part of a group which—
text.IndentOne: (a) carries on an excluded activity or purports to do so, or
(b) contravenes any provision of an order under section 142E.
text.quote: (2) The appropriate regulator must exercise the group restructuring powers if it is satisfied that a ring-fenced body is operating in contravention of subsection (1).”
